sentences.sContent: The whale, like the dolphin, has become a symbol of the marvels of creation.
sentences.sCn: 鲸，和海豚一样，已经成为造物杰作的象征。

remMethod.val: mar(毁坏) + vel(音似： well“好”) → 遭到彻底的毁坏再重建好， 真是奇迹 → 奇迹

words.tran: 了不起的；非凡的；令人惊异的；不平常的
奇迹般地；不可思议地；令人惊讶地

trans.tranCn: 令人惊奇的事物(或人物)
trans.tranOther: You can describe something or someone as a marvel to indicate that you think that they are wonderful
